detail_desc: Knee-length running shorts in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with elastication and a concealed drawstring at the waist.Crotch and side stripes in ventilating mesh. Jersey inner shorts.
Semi shiny tights that shape the tummy, thighs and calves while also encouraging blood circulation in the legs. Elasticated waist. 20 denier.
Long earrings in metal and plastic. Length 12 cm.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs on one shoulder and at the crotch.
Sleeveless playsuit in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and discreet pockets in the side seams.

Small shoulder bag in grained imitation leather with a zip at the top and narrow adjustable shoulder strap with carabiner hooks at each end. One outer compartment with an imitation suede flap and magnetic fastener. Lined. Size 18x23 cm.
Brazilian briefs in jersey and lace with a low, V-shaped waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Sports bra in fast-drying functional fabric. Lined front with removable inserts, a racer back and a wide elasticated hem. Extra firm support.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, a fake back pocket and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jacquard-knit socks in a stretch cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Top and leggings with a motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif and long raglan sleeves. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and print motif.
Cap in a cotton weave with an adjustable tab and metal fastener at the back.
Short, fitted dress in a crinkled weave with a concealed zip at the back and short sleeves. Seam at the waist with a small frill trim and decorative tie belt, and pleats front and back. Unlined.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with lacing at the front, a tongue, zip in one side and loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Baby Exclusive. Cardigan in soft, pattern-knit organic cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Sleeveless dress in soft jersey with decorative bows on the shoulder straps and a gathered seam with a flounce at the hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Short-sleeved football shirt in fast-drying functional fabric with print motifs front and back.
Mug in transparent printed plastic with a screw top and straw. Diameter at the top 10 cm, height 15.5 cm.
Short, 5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with worn details, a button fly and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with long raglan sleeves, buttons down the front and a narrow, ribbed trim around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings with pendants. Diameter 2 cm.
Super push-up bra in lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a racer back and metal front fastenings.

Slightly shorter top in soft, ribbed jersey made from a cotton blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The cotton content of the top is recycled.
Flared, sleeveless top in woven fabric made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend with narrow shoulders straps and a gathered seam at the top. Cotton jersey lining.
Fully lined, 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Shorts in printed sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Soft brushed inside.
Baby Exclusive. Dressing gown in soft organic cotton with a hood and a wrapover with a button at the sides.
Hooded jacket with a zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Checked jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a waist panel.

Anorak in woven fabric with contrasting colour grosgrain and a lined hood with a drawstring and zip at the top. Elasticated cuffs, side pockets and elastication and a drawstring at the hem. Half-lined.
Padded velour slippers in the shape of hamburgers with embroidery and appliqués. Soft soles with anti-slip protectors.
Narrow waist belt in imitation leather with a metal chain hanging at one side and a metal buckle at the front. Width 1.7 cm.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Cotton jersey hipster briefs in various designs with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Padded sleep bag in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder and zip at one side. Jersey lining. The sleep bag is designed for indoor use only.
Warm-lined, waterproof hi-tops in imitation leather and fabric with a hook and loop tab and elasticated lacing at the front, and reflective details. Pile linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Brazilian briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Printed jersey top with short cap sleeves and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long jumper in a soft, chunky knit with a ribbed stand-up collar, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Leggings in washed, patterned stretch denim with an elasticated waist, fake fly and fake front pockets.

Short, round-necked dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, an elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a wide flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.
Joggers in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist and legs with contrasting colour stripes down the sides and slits at the hems.
Fitted tops in stretch, organic cotton jersey with a wide neckline and long sleeves.
Blouse in a plumeti cotton weave with a small stand-up collar, button placket and pin-tucks and inset lace trims at the top. Short, flounced sleeves and a yoke with decorative gathers at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Heavily draping jersey top with a sheen and short sleeves.
Fully lined, patterned bikini bottoms with a high waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a collar, V-neck, buttons down the front, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Jacket in patterned, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip with a chin guard at the front.
Baby Exclusive. Turban in crushed velvet with a decorative knot detail at the front and a soft cotton jersey lining.
Ballet pumps with an elastic strap over the foot and a decorative bow at the front. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Top in soft faux shearling with a high collar, zip at the top, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides.

Pyjamas with a top and shorts in soft viscose jersey. Top with a slightly wider neckline and short, lace-trimmed raglan sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access. Short shorts with a low, wrapover waist with covered elastication, and lace-trimmed hems.
Long-sleeved dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and a seam with a wide flounce a the hem.
Double-layered sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Gathered side seams for best fit over the tummy.
Sleeveless, ankle-length jumpsuit in softly draping denim with a V-neck and buttons at the top. Narrow elasticated seam and a detachable tie belt at the waist, side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Pull-on trousers in stretch, cotton-blend twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, tapered legs with decorative seams at the knees and ribbed hems. Fake fly.
Bandeau bra in soft stretch fabric with a hole pattern at the front and detachable, adjustable shoulder straps. No fasteners. Seamless.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Top in a soft, fine knit with a lightly brushed finish. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a chest pocket, slits in the sides and raw-edge hem. Longer at the back.
Cigarette trousers in woven fabric with a regular waist, concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and tapered, ankle-length legs with creases.
Long cardigan in a soft knit containing some wool with low dropped shoulders, front pockets and no buttons.
Boxy-style jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. The polyester content of the jumper is recycled.
Tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline and short sleeves.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. Shorter mesh vest top with a print motif on the front layered over the top.
Ankle-length treggings in washed denim with a high waist, zip fly and button and two open back pockets. Tapered legs with patterned side stripes.
Suede sandals with ties at the top, a zip at the heel and leather insoles. Heel 8.5 cm.
Soft nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Soft integral top with an elasticated hem and functional fastening for easier nursing access.

Fitted body in soft, ribbed jersey with a deep neckline at the front with decorative ties at the top. Short, elasticated, frilled sleeves with gathers at the shoulders, and concealed fasteners at the crotch.
Loose-fitting vest top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck.

Outdoor jacket in a printed weave with a lined, detachable hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front. Elasticated drawstring at the waist, flap front pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Lined.
Top in cotton piqué with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined bikini with an all-over shimmering metallic print. Tiered top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.

Lined bandeau bikini top with a round, covered buckle at the front and padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps with flounces that have overlocked edges, a concealed silicone trim at the top, and side support.
Plastic hoop earrings. Size approx. 4 cm.
Long-sleeved tops in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs down one side. One patterned top and one in a solid colour.
